page.description: In-line style for login error messages.

discussion.p: The *[ui:In-line style for login errors]* can be used to customize how login errors appear (font color, size, etc). Messages are displayed in the Placeholder control specified by [Placeholder for login errors].

important.p: If *[ui:Placeholder for login errors]* is not set, this setting is ignored.
